name: truevis A360 embedder
author: Eric Boehlke - truevis.com

sections.description:
Embed Autodesk BIM 360, Fusion 360, or A360 content | Sample Shortcode [a360 src=”https://myhub.autodesk360.com/ue294cc65/shares/public/SHabee1QT1a327cf2b7ab82fe63a09f449dc”]

Sample Shortcode
[a360 src=”https://myhub.autodesk360.com/ue294cc65/shares/public/SHabee1QT1a327cf2b7ab82fe63a09f449dc”]

Embed Option — use ‘?mode=embed’ at the end of the URL
[a360 src=”https://myhub.autodesk360.com/ue294cc65/shares/public/SHabee1QT1a327cf2b7ab82fe63a09f449dc”]

Small

[a360 src=”https://myhub.autodesk360.com/ue294cc65/shares/public/SHabee1QT1a327cf2b7ab82fe63a09f449dc?mode=embed” width=”640″ height=”480″]

Medium

Any size

[a360 src=”https://myhub.autodesk360.com/ue294cc65/shares/public/SHabee1QT1a327cf2b7ab82fe63a09f449dc?mode=embed” width=”200″ height=”200″]
sections.faq:
Works for A360 and BIM 360 Autodesk-hosted or self-hosted content

Installation Instructions

Install and Activate
